summary: The U.S. military services operate a combined 36 military correctional facilities around the world. As of 2021, these facilities held 1,131 service members who were awaiting trial or had been sentenced by court-martial. Each service branch is responsible for ensuring the health and safety of the staff and incarcerated service members at their respective facilities. title: Military Correctional Facilities: Consistent Application of Standards and Improved Oversight Could Enhance Health and Safety
